entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-04-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • The warning of XLS1111 appears once open MAUI App file Resources\Styles\Styles.xaml #29218

Closed

  • File Picker not opening dialogue on MacOS #29217
  • Android subscriptions gets refunded after 3 days automatically #29212

PullRequests

Created

  • [iOS] NavigationBarHiddenAnimation - iOS specifics #29220
    proposal/open, area-navigation, platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-shell, community ✨, .NET 10.0-preview5

Updated

  • [Testing] Fix for UITest Catalyst screenshot dimension inconsistency and image cropping issue #29204
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
